```{r}
matpow <- function(A, p){
  with(eigen(A), vectors %*% diag(values^p, nrow(A)) %*% t(vectors))
}
(ccdecomp <- eigen(matpow(PCCs[3:4,3:4],-1/2) %*% PCCs[3:4,1:2] %*% solve(PCCs[1:2,1:2]) %*% PCCs[1:2,3:4] %*% matpow(PCCs[3:4,3:4],-1/2)))
ans_c_i <- sqrt(ccdecomp$values)
ans_c_i
```
